00210         void DrawText(const wchar_t* pText,Point2D* pPoint,DWORD dwColor)
00211         {
00212                 Point2D tmp = {0, 0};
00213 
00214                 RectangleStruct rect = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00215                 PUSH_PTR(rect);
00216                 THISCALL(0x411510);
00217 
00218                 PUSH_IMM(0x16);         //???
00219                 PUSH_IMM(0);            //???
00220                 PUSH_VAR32(dwColor);
00221                 PUSH_VAR32(pPoint);
00222                 PUSH_PTR(rect);
00223                 PUSH_VAR32(this);
00224                 PUSH_VAR32(pText);
00225                 PUSH_PTR(tmp);
00226                 CALL(0x4A60E0);
00227 
00228                 ADD_ESP(0x20);
00229         }
00230         void DrawText(const wchar_t* pText,int X,int Y,DWORD dwColor)
00231         {
00232                 Point2D P = {X ,Y};
